            <entry>cahi1:data_031ad43db16699f6ccbaec5fa00a72ea95abef12</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water and ice molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser- und Eismoleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Molécules de l'eau et de glace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moléculas da água e do gelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molecole del ghiaccio e dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόρια ύδατος και πάγου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Moléculas del agua y del hielo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that water molecules occupy less space as a liquid (a) and occupy greater space as a solid (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Wassermoleküle 
weniger Platz als flüssiges (a) besetzen und grösseren Platz als 
festes (b) besetzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que les molécules 
d'eau occupent moins d'espace comme (a) liquide et occupent le plus 
grand espace comme (b) plein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que as moléculas de 
água ocupam menos espaço como um (a) líquido e ocupam um espaço 
mais grande como um (b) contínuo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che le molecole di 
acqua occupano meno spazio come (a) liquido ed occupano lo spazio più
grande come (b) solido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι τα μόρια ύδατος 
καταλαμβάνουν το λιγότερο διάστημα ως υγρό (α) και καταλαμβάνουν 
το μεγαλύτερο διάστημα ως στερεό (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que las moléculas de
agua ocupan menos espacio como (a) líquido y ocupan mayor espacio 
como (b) sólido.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
